name: Uncanny Islands
description: You crash on a small island, where you need to get your first food and build shelter. Beware, there are many dangers on the islands. Build, explore, and survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad Core Processor Memory: 4 GB RAM Storage: 700 MB available space
